definition: to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
Oirat Mongols (alliance of tribes of Western Mongolia) (Ming Dynasty term)
see 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁[Za1 ma3 la2 ding1]
old Chinese name for Bengal, now written 孟加拉[Meng4 jia1 la1]
Ming Dynasty name for modern day Malacca/see also 馬六甲|马六甲[Ma3 liu4 jia3]
Jamal al-Din ibn Muhammad al-Najjari (13th century), famous Persian astronomer and scholar who served Khubilai Khan 忽必烈 from c. 1260

sentences.english: She never uses it on workers, drones, or people.
sentences.chinese: 她从来不用她的螫针去剌工蜂，雄蜂，或人。

sentences.english: Tis the god Hercules, whom Antony loved, Now leaves him.
sentences.chinese: 这是安东尼所崇拜的赫剌克勒斯，现在离开他了。

sentences.english: From her childhood she loved Pyramus who lived in an adjoining house.
sentences.chinese: 从小她就爱上了隔壁邻居皮剌摩斯。

sentences.english: Only bring me a newly peeled reed, and slit it, that I may cut the child's life from mine.
sentences.chinese: 把苇子削好，我就能用它把娃娃和我剌断了。

sentences.english: A soothing foam for the relief of itching and burning due to hot spots, insect bites and allergic rashes.
sentences.chinese: 舒缓因为红疹，虫咬及敏感引起的痕痒及剌疼。

sentences.english: A lady, named Aruw of Labao, live inside of LuPam Village.
sentences.chinese: 剌宝地方阿若女，住在鲁盘村庄里。

sentences.english: The rheumatism stasis of blood stagnates , gradually forms the bone to perverse.
sentences.chinese: 风湿瘀血凝滞，逐渐形成骨剌。

sentences.english: Nucleus raphe dorsalis (RD) plays an important role in acupuncture analgesia.
sentences.chinese: 中缝背核在针剌镇痛过程中起重要作用。

sentences.english: He thrust a dagger into her heart.
sentences.chinese: 他把匕首剌入她的心脏。

sentences.english: Detective Lu said that the victim was attacked with a knife and bled to death as a result.
sentences.chinese: 卢侦探说遇害者是被刀剌中，因失血过多而死。

sentences.english: Espree Bright White Shampoo whitens and brightens without the use of bleach and harsh chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 爱斯亮白洗毛水不含漂白剂和其它剌激的代学品。

sentences.english: Her face broke out with pimples.
Tom Dula was a Civil War veteran in North Carolina.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆都剌是北卡罗莱纳州的内战老兵。

sentences.english: Parodies or satirical works are also protected.
sentences.chinese: 滑稽或讽剌作品也受到保护。

sentences.english: During the fight he was knifed in the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 在战斗中，他的腹部被刀剌中。

definition: Bayan (name)/Bayan of the Baarin (1236-1295), Mongol Yuan general under Khubilai Khan, victorious over the Southern Song 1235-1239/Bayan of the Merkid (-1340), Yuan dynasty general and politician
Tartar (various northern tribes in ancient China)/Tatar (Turkic ethnic group in central Asia)
Tangut branch of the Qiang 羌 ethnic group/ancient ethnic group who made up the Xixia dynasty 西夏 1038-1227
Qarluq or Karluk nomadic tribe, a Turkic ethnic minority in ancient times
thin piece of wood used a writing tablet (in ancient China)/a kind of official document (in former times)/letter/note/plague
Qidan or Khitan, ethnic group in ancient China, a branch of the Eastern Hu people inhabiting the valley of the Xar Murun River in the upper reaches of the Liao River 遼河|辽河[Liao2 He2]
Huihe, pre-Tang name of ethnic group corresponding to modern Uighur
(old)(interjection expressing disapproval, commiseration etc) tut!/Taiwan pr. [duo4]
